00035 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00037     public static class HttpRequest {
00038         // ============================================
00039         // PRIVATE STATIC Members
00040         // ============================================
00041         private static WebProxy proxy;

00043         // ============================================
00044         // PUBLIC STATIC Methods
00045         // ============================================
00047         public static string Ip (UserInfo userInfo) {
00048             // Make Url & Request
00049             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "GetIp.php", null);
00050             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00051 
00052             // Parse Xml Response
00053             if (xml.FirstTag == "ip")
00054                 return(xml.BodyText);
00055 
00056             // Request Error
00057             throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00058         }
00059 
00061         public static int Port (UserInfo userInfo) {
00062             // Make Url & Request
00063             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "GetPort.php", null);
00064             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00065 
00066             // Parse Xml Response
00067             if (xml.FirstTag == "port")
00068                 return(Int32.Parse(xml.BodyText));
00069 
00070             // Request Error
00071             throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00072         }
00073 
00075         public static bool Authentication (UserInfo userInfo) {
00076             // Set Options
00077             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00078             options.Add("magic", userInfo.Informations["magic"]);
00079 
00080             // Make Url & Request
00081             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "UserAuth.php", options);
00082             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00083 
00084             // Parse Xml Response
00085             if (xml.FirstTag == "authentication")
00086                 return(true);
00087 
00088             // Request Error
00089             return(false);
00090         }
00091 
00093         public static bool Login (UserInfo userInfo, string password) {
00094             // Set Options
00095             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00096             options.Add("passwd", password);
00097 
00098             // Make Url & Request
00099             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "Login.php", options);
00100             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00101 
00102             // Parse Xml Response
00103             if (xml.FirstTag == "login") {
00104                 userInfo.Informations.Add("ipweb", xml.Attributes["ip"]);
00105                 userInfo.Informations.Add("magic", xml.BodyText);
00106                 return(true);
00107             }
00108 
00109             // Request Error
00110             throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00111         }
00112 
00114         public static void Logout (UserInfo userInfo) {
00115             // Set Options
00116             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00117             options.Add("magic", userInfo.Informations["magic"]);
00118 
00119             // Make Url & Request
00120             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "Logout.php", options);
00121             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00122 
00123             // Parse Xml Response
00124             if (xml.FirstTag != "logout") {
00125                 // Request Error
00126                 throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00127             }
00128         }
00129 
00131         public static void Connect (UserInfo userInfo, int port) {
00132             // Set Options
00133             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00134             options.Add("magic", userInfo.Informations["magic"]);
00135             options.Add("port", port.ToString());
00136 
00137             // Make Url & Request
00138             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "Connect.php", options);
00139             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00140 
00141             // Parse Xml Response
00142             if (xml.FirstTag != "connect") {
00143                 // Request Error
00144                 throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00145             }
00146         }
00147 
00149         public static void Disconnect (UserInfo userInfo) {
00150             // Set Options
00151             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00152             options.Add("magic", userInfo.Informations["magic"]);
00153 
00154             // Make Url & Request
00155             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "Disconnect.php", options);
00156             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00157 
00158             // Parse Xml Response
00159             if (xml.FirstTag != "disconnect") {
00160                 // Request Error
00161                 throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00162             }
00163         }

00166         public static void Update (UserInfo userInfo) {
00167             // Set Options
00168             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00169             options.Add("magic", userInfo.Informations["magic"]);
00170 
00171             // Make Url & Request
00172             string url = MakeUrl(userInfo, "Update.php", options);
00173             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00174 
00175             // Parse Xml Response
00176             if (xml.FirstTag != "update") {
00177                 // Request Error
00178                 throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00179             }
00180         }

00183         public static string UserNameIsAvailable (string username) {
00184             // Set Options
00185             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00186             options.Add("user", username);
00187             options.Add("checkAvail", "username");
00188 
00189             // Make Url & Request
00190             string url = MakeUrl("Registration.php", options);
00191             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00192 
00193             // Parse Xml Response
00194             if (xml.FirstTag == "error") {
00195                 // Request Error
00196                 throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00197             }
00198 
00199             return(xml.BodyText);
00200         }
00201 
00203         public static void RegisterAccount (string user, string pass, string mail) {
00204             // Set Options
00205             Hashtable options = new Hashtable();
00206             options.Add("user", user);
00207             options.Add("pass", CryptoUtils.MD5String(pass));
00208             options.Add("mail", mail);
00209 
00210             // Make Url & Request
00211             string url = MakeUrl("Registration.php", options);
00212             XmlRequest xml = MakeRequest(url);
00213 
00214             // Parse Xml Response
00215             if (xml.FirstTag == "error") {
00216                 // Request Error
00217                 throw(new Exception(xml.FirstTag + ": " + xml.BodyText));
00218             }
00219         }

00221         // ============================================
00222         // PUBLIC STATIC Proxy Methods
00223         // ============================================
00225         public static void SetProxyServer (string server, int port) {
00226             proxy = new WebProxy(server, port);
00227             proxy.BypassProxyOnLocal = true;
00228         }
00229 
00231         public static void SetProxyCredential (string userName, string password) {
00232             proxy.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(userName, password);
00233         }
00234 
00236         public static void SetProxyCredential (string userName, 
00237                                                string password,
00238                                                string domain)
00239         {
00240             proxy.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(userName, password, domain);          
00241         }
00242 
00244         public static void UnsetProxy() {
00245             proxy = null;
00246         }
00247 
00248         // ============================================
00249         // PRIVATE Methods
00250         // ============================================
00251         private static string MakeUrl (UserInfo userInfo, string pg, Hashtable opts) 
00252         {
00253             StringBuilder url = new StringBuilder();
00254             url.Append("http://");
00255             url.Append(userInfo.GetDomain());
00256             url.Append("/NyFolder/");
00257             url.Append(pg);
00258             url.Append("?");
00259             url.Append("user=");
00260             url.Append(userInfo.GetName());
00261 
00262             AddUrlOpts(ref url, opts);
00263 
00264             return(url.ToString());
00265         }
00266 
00267         public static string MakeUrl (string pg, Hashtable opts) {
00268             StringBuilder url = new StringBuilder();
00269             url.Append("http://nyfolder.berlios.de/NyFolder/");
00270             url.Append(pg);
00271             url.Append("?");
00272 
00273             AddUrlOpts(ref url, opts);
00274 
00275             return(url.ToString());
00276         }
00277 
00278         private static void AddUrlOpts (ref StringBuilder url, Hashtable opts) {
00279             if (opts != null) {
00280                 foreach (string name in opts.Keys) {
00281                     url.Append('&');
00282                     url.Append(name);
00283                     url.Append('=');
00284                     url.Append((string) opts[name]);
00285                 }
00286             }
00287         }
00288 
00289         private static XmlRequest MakeRequest (string url) {
00290 //          Debug.Log("Web Request: '{0}'", url);
00291 
00292             // Make Http Request
00293             WebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(url);
00294             request.Timeout = 5000;
00295 
00296             if ((proxy = Utils.Proxy.GetConfig()) != null)
00297                 request.Proxy = proxy;
00298 
00299             // Wait Http Response
00300             WebResponse response = request.GetResponse();
00301             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest(response.GetResponseStream());
00302             xmlRequest.Parse();
00303             response.Close();
00304             return(xmlRequest);
00305         }
00306         
00307         // ============================================
00308         // PUBLIC Properties
00309         // ============================================
00310         public static  WebProxy Proxy {
00311             get { return(proxy); }
00312         }
00313     }
